items.title: If Apple makes a foldable phone, analysts say this stock will benefit
items.description: U.S. hedge fund magnate Steve Cohen has also jumped in to buy the stock, according to filings with the Hong Kong stock exchange.

items.description: The tempestuous situation poses myriad thorny questions for which there are no easy answers.

items.description: Block is joining the S&P 500, replacing Hess as of July 23.

items.title: Rich American Express customers continue to spend freely, with one exception
items.description: American Express said Friday that travel spending in the quarter was weaker than transactions for goods and services.
